name: Dopamine Dreams VR
description:
This psychedelic experimental VR experience immerses us in a (very) fictional realm known as 'consumer culture'. 

Wielding our 'spending power' in each hand, we interact with the world around us (It's not much, but it's something). That said, it feels like there's an endless barrage of distraction, subliminal messaging, and manipulation is aimed right at us...

How do we defend ourselves against this relentless onslaught?
Is there any escape from this place? 
Who's really in control here?
